content: i am so excited to share my diane beanie free crochet pattern with you the diane beanie makes up so soft and it is the perfect project for someone needing a pretty hat to wear while having chemo treatment but also forever afterwards as well as it is so stylish i used the soft pink caron simply soft yarn for my diane beanie the diane beanie pattern is a top-down beanie the body of the beanie is made up of single_crochet stitches worked with an i hook so it has a soft yet dense texture the brim is made with back loop only single_crochet stitches this type of brim is simple and elegantly stylish video tutuorial is available at youtubel 1 1 https //youtu be/dgrumkjbtwk si=lnu5kjwu1w6y-qs5
